function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate crisis management and response to disease outbreaks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decline in urban park visitation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ontology-based integration and analysis of anti-coronavirus drugs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate precautionary measures in sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of propagation of contagious diseases during the data collection process, especially with the involvement of multiple households.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicts between different groups of visitors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of service or facility to assist victims of domestic violence in existing residential buildings.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse and misrepresentation of wbe data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reducing transmission in buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Containment of infection cluster","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of reporting system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to spatial plots for case studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The aeroponic system on the balcony introduces a potential risk of contamination or spread of plant-borne diseases within the home.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak sustainability approach and the assumption of substitutability between economy and nature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enduring relevance of the considerations in the paper for energy social science and research practices.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Vulnerability of elderly population to disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Positive effect of methods in all types of buildings may lead to a false sense of security","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Labour shortages due to lockdown, furlough scheme, and workforce infections","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-lasting small aerosols with potential to transmit infection over great distances","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bias in model due to inclusion of deaths from non-locally acquired infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small sample sizes increase the effect of overfitting in validation methods.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the long-term effects and changes in the built environment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 among construction workers due to close physical proximity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of inaccurate data on social platforms causing panic and fear.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variations in pmmov concentrations across samples without understanding the stability over time for the catchment population.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation strategies leading to poor air quality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Empirical estimation of population size parameter affecting simulation execution time","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High reliance on social media for communication and decision making may lead to echo chambers and confirmation bias, influencing public perception of covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact on supply chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Importation of vector-borne diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of stay-at-home on physical and mental workplace health and safety monitoring","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through droplet secretions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unprecedented reduction in global co2 emissions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact of prolonged self-isolation on mental health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate protocol, staff, and equipment for managing limited access and monitoring compliance in green risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of new technologies and communication infrastructure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelm, stress","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and overcrowding in buildings can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stigmatization of locations affected by contagious diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for clear visibility of four satellites for accurate point calculation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate allocation of community service facilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effect of pandemics on trade and risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Designing with natural sceneries in suburban villas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate reporting of building occupancy
